assessments.status_rationale: No information in today’s bullets reports an S&P 500 close at/above 7,200, and the deadline (2026-03-31) has not passed. Market-volatility coverage is not sufficient to adjudicate the specific level/close condition.

Today’s news mentions a large Microsoft market-cap drop after earnings, but does not provide Microsoft FY2026 Q3 (quarter ending 2026-03-31) ‘Azure and other cloud services’ constant-currency growth. The relevant earnings release/call is still in the future.
No bullet reports an additional Amazon layoff announcement of ≥5,000 roles beyond the ~16,000 previously reported, and the deadline (2026-06-30) has not passed.
None of today’s bullets provide Brent front-month settlement prices or indicate a ≥$95.00 settle. The deadline (2026-04-30) remains in the future.
No item indicates the FCC published an NPRM or Report & Order strengthening orbital-debris mitigation requirements. Deadline (2026-09-30) has not passed.

While today’s news notes Venezuelan lawmakers approved an overhaul of the oil sector, it does not provide OPEC MOMR secondary-sources production data showing ≥1.10 mb/d for any month. Deadline (2026-09-30) has not passed.
No bullet indicates Tesla disclosed (in an SEC filing) an equity investment in xAI totaling ≥$1.0B. Deadline (2026-08-15) has not passed.

Today’s coverage references AI-driven memory/PC pricing dynamics but does not cite a Micron disclosure explicitly labeling HBM revenue of ≥$1.0B in a single quarter. Deadline (2026-09-30) has not passed.
No bullet reports a public external release of AlphaGenome via API or downloadable model/weights/code. Deadline (2026-12-31) has not passed.
